metadata.title: CVE-2014-9462 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
The _validaterepo function in sshpeer in Mercurial before 3.2.4 allowsremote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via a crafted repositoryname in a clone command.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-9462` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mercurial - 2.8.2-1ubuntu1.3
mercurial-common - 2.8.2-1ubuntu1.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mercurial package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.8.2-1ubuntu1.3').
